con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://am1.com/03" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://am1.com/03" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://am1.com/03"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://am1.com/03" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="booking"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="firstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="lastName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="passportNumber" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="departureDate" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="arrivalDate" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="departureAirport" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="arrivalAirport" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="serviceStatus"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="statusCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="getBookingRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBookingResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceStatus" type="tns:serviceStatus"/> <xs:element name="booking" type="tns:booking"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllBookingsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllBookingsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceStatus" type="tns:serviceStatus"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="booking" type="tns:booking"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addBookingRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="booking" type="tns:booking"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addBookingResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceStatus" type="tns:serviceStatus"/> <xs:element name="deleteBookingRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteBookingResponse"> con:configuration.content: <ns2:serviceStatus xmlns:ns2="http://am1.com/03" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <ns2:statusCode>CONFLICT</ns2:statusCode> <ns2:message>Exception while finding Entity: No booking with id: 9900!</ns2:message> </ns2:serviceStatus>
